name: A Gremlin, Giraffe and Drip Coffee Kind of Mondays
description:
*please turn on audio*
“Life can be magnificent and overwhelming—that is the whole tragedy. Without beauty, love, or danger it would almost be easy to live.” —Albert Camus

Let us learn to ignore the goblins and giraffes of our minds and focus on the task ahead, because focus is one of the great paths to our inner peace (with coffee as an IV Drip into our veins helps too!)

Pixelart & animation done on Procreate and Music by made me,
